Dear Amazon Web Services Customer,

Whether you're trying to jump start your career or just pick up a new techn=
ical skill in 2016, AWS training classes can help. Taught by accredited tec=
hnical instructors, our classes include hands-on labs to help you learn new=
 skills and best practices for working with AWS.=20

AWS Classes & Workshops
=20
Learn AWS skills and best practices in person or online from our global net=
work of accredited technical instructors and APN Training Partners. Registe=
r for a public class or ask us about private on-site classes for your team.=

icountry=3Demea&sc_icampaigntype=3Dnewsletter&sc_icampaign=3Dem_158486500&s=
c_idetail=3Dem_2075729300&ref_=3D109

 about IT solutions.

</td>
</tr>
<tr ><td style=3D"font-family:arial, helvetica, sans-serif; line-height:20p=

tems administrators and software developers</span>
